children.McCabe1976: McCabe, T. (1976). A complexity measure. Software Engineering, IEEE Transactions on, 4, 308–320
children.Ing2003: Ing, M., & Georgiadou, E. (2003). Software Quality Model Requirements for Software Quality Engineering. In 14th International Conference on the Software Quality Requirement.
children.Basili1994:
Basili, V. R., Caldiera, G., & Rombach, H. D. (1994). The Goal Question Metric approach. In Encyclopedia of Software Engineering. Wiley.

children.ISO9126: International Organization for Standardization. (2005). ISO/IEC 9126 Software Engineering - Product Quality - Parts 1-4.
children.ISO250xx: International Organization for Standardization. (2005). ISO/IEC 25000:2005 Software engineering - Software product Quality Requirements and Evaluation (SQuaRE) - Guide to SQuaRE.
children.Chidamber1994: Shyam R. Chidamber, & Chris F. Kemerer. (1994). A Metrics Suite for Object Oriented Design. IEEE Transactions on Software Engineering, 20(6), 476 – 493.
